content: These are Bitmain coupons, which can be used to deduct 30% of miner cost or anything else you buy from their website ( you can read more about them on Bitmain's website).I am selling them for 40% disscount, minumum quantity is $5,000 worth of coupons which is $3,000 in BTC/USDT.PM me if you are interested.
